Chairman of Russian Federation Council Here
articles.content:
Chairman of Russian Federation Council Here 
    Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Sergei Mikhailovich Mironov, chairman of the Federation Council of Russia, arrived here Sunday to pay an official goodwill visit to the DPRK at the invitation of its Supreme People's Assembly.
 He was accompanied by Oleg Nikolayevich Kozhemyako, member of the Federation Council, Bato-Zhargal Zhyambalnimbuyev, vice-chairman of the Control Committee for the Activities of the Council, Valery Pavlovich Parfyonov, director of the Secretariat for the Chairman of Council, and others.    
 They were greeted at the airport by Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the SPA, officials concerned, Andrei Gennadievich Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the embassy.

Lao President Hopes for Stronger Friendly Tie with DPRK
articles.content:
Lao President Hopes for Stronger Friendly Tie with DPRK 
    Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Khamtay Siphandone, chairman of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, expressed hope for continued development of the Laos-DPRK friendly relations in the future when receiving credentials from the DPRK ambassador e. p. to Laos on Sept. 7.
 Recalling that the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries have developed friendly and cooperative relations in various fields and supported and cooperated with each other in the international arena from long ago, the president stated that the Lao party, government and people would continue to support the lines and policies put forward by the Workers' Party of Korea.

Pak Pong Ju Meets Chairman of Russian Federation Council
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Chairman of Russian Federation Council 
    Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, met and had a friendly talk with Chairman of the Federation Council of Russia Sergei Mikhailovich Mironov who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
 Present there were Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly Sin An Son, officials concerned and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Gennadiyevich Karlov, Member of the Federation Council Oleg Nikolayevich Kozhemyako, Vice-Chairman of the Control Committee for the Activities of the Federation Council Bato-Zhargal Zhyambalnimbuyev, Director of the Secretariat for the Chairman of the Federation Council Valery Pavlovich Parfyonov, and others.

Paek Nam Sun Meets Swiss Ambassador
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets Swiss Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun conversed with Swiss Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Dominique Dreyer who paid a farewell call on him Monday.
 On hand were an official concerned and the resident coordinator of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation of the Federal Department of Foreign Affairs.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets British Foreign Office Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets British Foreign Office Delegation
    Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Foreign and Commonwealth Office of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland led by Bill Rammell, deputy secretary of State for Foreign Affairs, that paid a courtesy call on him on Monday.
 Present there were an official concerned and the British ambassador e. p. to the DPRK.
